mapper.select: SELECT order_id, product_id, buyer_id, status, amount, created_at, updated_at FROM orders WHERE product_id = #{productId} ORDER BY order_id DESC LIMIT 1
mapper.update: UPDATE orders SET status = #{status}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE order_id = #{orderId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO orders (product_id, buyer_id, status, amount) VALUES (#{productId}, #{buyerId}, #{status}, #{amount})
